title: iTu sAhasamu (p)
sahitya:
iTu sAhasamulu yAla nApai cakkani sAmi


anupallavi

  iTuvagalu tALanA taramA


caraNam 1    ika cinnadAna nEnu maguvArIni mukhamu
 eraganEyunnanuvagAkasAri nIkidimyAra gadE valapu nyAyamerugu nA sAmi
 caraNam 2    manasu rancitamayyE nIku taginamaguvatO Ivagalunca valanu 
vinavayyaraa nApalukulu I vyALanu vintalucAlu cAlu nA sAmi
 caraNam 3    sarasija nEtruDani karuNavalla cAla yauvanamuvacenADu 
marukELilO nE ninu lAlintunu sarasa pankajanbha nA sAmi
